2909df86d8d914f61dea394637cf2022 (10:44): i think i'll learn c++ first
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (10:45): qt uses very "clean" c++, so it's not hard to use for someone with basic knowledge of c++
c77056b0586f92d41cf647cd487ec339 (11:05): i think he meant readable ;)
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (11:09): i meant that qt could be a maze of twisting templates, but it isn't
d166c00706088a1723ca6ed2590378eb (11:09): I have a base widget, in the constructor I add a label and set the color of its text with setPaletteForegroundColor(Qt::yellow);
d166c00706088a1723ca6ed2590378eb (11:10): then I have a sub class of this widget
d166c00706088a1723ca6ed2590378eb (11:10): in which i set a background image
d166c00706088a1723ca6ed2590378eb (11:11): my problem is the background of my label
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (11:11): it's not using the pixmap?
d166c00706088a1723ca6ed2590378eb (11:12): is there a known workaround?
d166c00706088a1723ca6ed2590378eb (11:13): if I set the foreground color of the label in the child class it uses the right background
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (11:13): to make it repaint itselt
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (11:13): yeah, after setting the background
2909df86d8d914f61dea394637cf2022 (11:13): if i develop a application and i want to sell it, i have to buy a qt licence?

e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (11:15): '''Notice that the term "free" is about rights, not money. The Free Software Foundation (creators of the GNU GPL) speaks of free in this context as in "free speech", not as in "no cost".'''
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (11:16): my interpretation is that you can sell your software, but it should be gpl
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (11:17): this can be interesting for a startup: http://www.trolltech.com/products/qt/licenses/pricing/licensing/smallbusiness
6cd441fd9e310b49e974e42acc0d5c0f (11:18): i have a QLineEdit *field, I have to get via this field data preformatted xxx-xxx, where '-
6cd441fd9e310b49e974e42acc0d5c0f (11:18): '-' is sign that must be, is any possibility to preformat/check this just in time wrtiting data in this field?
6cd441fd9e310b49e974e42acc0d5c0f (11:20): ok, thanks , i will read this
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (11:21): you can basically create a totally own validator that checks anything
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (11:22): so if you can reduce the format to a QRegExp you should be set
7780ad7003f15ffc3b31177513eac4f9 (11:27): asdx: trolltech will tell  you that you need to purchase a license before even developing a commercial app
7780ad7003f15ffc3b31177513eac4f9 (11:27): search slashdot discussions on this matter
e5c246c422bf5aeed2dab4c68c680e2b (11:28): otherwise all the developers for apps that fail and never get release would never purchase a commercial edition
